title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 36.1 - Authority
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 36.1 - Authority

State Regulations

Chapter 54 of the Laws of 1985 established an industrial
access program, and required that the commissioner promulgate rules and
regulations establishing criteria for providing assistance under this program, including standards for receiving assistance such as the number of jobs created
or maintained by the transportation improvement, the maximum amount of each
award and the information that must be provided by the entity requesting
assistance. Chapter 54 of the Laws of subsequent years, and most recently 1992, continued the Industrial Access Program and the requirement that rules and
regulations be promulgated by the Commissioner of

Transportation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
36.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
